title: Wax and wool
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and Richard Raxlen
brief_description: In small Mexican villages, the local residents make colourful yarn paintings by pressing wool into a mixture of bee’s wax and resin. Records the fluid convergence of yarn, wax and resin into a two-dimensional design of brilliant colour and beauty.
